a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Women's educational attainment vs. fertility rate, 1950
The fertility rate, expressed as the number of children per woman, is based on age-specific fertility rates in one
particular year. Educational attainment is the average number of years of formal education received by women
Data source: UN, World Population Prospects (2024); Barro and Lee (2015); Lee and Lee (2016)
